title: China's Baidu starts layoffs after reporting Q3 loss
description: BEIJING/SHANGHAI — China’s Baidu started layoffs this week that will hit multiple business units, six sources briefed on the matter said, as the company struggles with intensifying competition in artificial intelligence and declining advertising revenue.

title: Hope France, India can collaborate more on issues like AI: Advisor to French expatriates for Hong Kong
description: Councillor for French Citizens Abroad representing France in Hong Kong and Macau, Marc Guyon, on Friday called for deeper collaboration between France and India on technology and social issues, particularly in emerging technologies like Artificial Intelligence, as well as addressing domestic challenges faced by France.
content: New Delhi [India], November 28 (ANI): Councillor for French Citizens Abroad representing France in Hong Kong and Macau, Marc Guyon, on Friday called for deeper collaboration between France and India on technology and social issues, particularly in em... [3861 chars]

title: Minister of Tourism Introduces "MaiA," an Artificial Intelligence Designed Specifically for Tourism
description: JAKARTA, Indonesia, Nov. 28, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Minister of Tourism Widiyanti Putri Wardhana introduced and launched the MaiA artificial intelligence system (Meticulous Artificial Intelligence of Indonesia) as part of the priority Tourism 5.0 program at the Sapta Pesona Building in Jakarta on Friday (28/11).

title: Ottawa starts public registry with over federal AI projects
description: The federal government has launched a public registry to keep Canadians in the loop on its growing use of artificial intelligence.
content:
OTTAWA — The federal government has launched a public registry to keep Canadians in the loop on its growing use of artificial intelligence.

title: Wayanad police nab notorious drug peddler from Delhi after months-long hunt
description: Raveesh was wanted in a case involving the smuggling of 265.55 grams of methamphetamine in July 2024..Wayanad police arrest, drug trafficking, narcotics case Alappuzha, methamphetamine smuggling Kerala, Raveesh Kumar arrest Delhi, software engineer drug peddler, Kerala drug cartel, interstate drug smuggling, MDMA seizure Wayanad, police surveillance Khanpur, how police arrested drug dealer, artificial intelligence overview drug crime, LLM analysis narcotics networks, using LLMs for crime prediction, predictive policing with large language models
content:
Kalpetta: A special team of Wayanad police nabbed R. Raveesh Kumar (28), a wanted criminal in multiple narcotics cases, from New Delhi on November 26. The accused, from Alappuzha, had moved to New Delhi to evade arrest.

title: Baidu AI chips growth: China faces shortage, Kunlunxin leads the market
description: Baidu is growing fast in AI chips in China, aiming to compete with Huawei and fill the gap left by Nvidia. Its Kunlunxin chips are used in data centers and cloud AI services. With strong local demand and limited foreign supply, Baidus chip business could grow a lot, making it a key player in Chinas artificial intelligence market.
content:
